Description: Part of the rim of a bowl of glassy rock-crystal: with an incised inscription on the outer surface. Under this inscription there is an earlier one in palimpsest.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: E. Naville, 'The Cemeteries of Abydos' I (London, 1913), 35 and pls.VIII (lower right), XIV, 1; F. Legge, ‘Proceedings of the Society of Biblical Archaeology’ 32 (London, 1910), pl.XXXII, 10; R. Weill, R. Weill, ‘Recherches sur la première dynastie et les temps prépharaoniques (Cairo, 1961) II, 150.
